name: places/ChIJOU0_jDv2wokRGQHC6mHfrH8
formattedAddress: 601 W 112th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 601 W 112th St, New York, NY 10025-1868, USA

originalText.text: I hadn't been to a hair salon in close to 2 years because I was trying to grow my 3c curly hair out. It finally got to a point recently where while it was long, it was fairly unruly. I was quite worried about trying a new hair salon, especially with my type of hair, but Brenda turned out to be exactly the person I needed! She did an amazing job and was super friendly, knowledgable and helpful, and that too, at a very affordable price. Will definitely be going back.

originalText.text: Simply the best! Extremely friendly and accommodating. The staff always makes me feel relaxed and my hair always looks fabulous when I leave. Love Salon 601.

text.text: Simply the best! Extremely friendly and accommodating. The staff always makes me feel relaxed and my hair always looks fabulous when I leave. Love Salon 601.

originalText.text:
I've been going to this salon for almost a year now, and at this point, I'd never go anywhere else.
Brenda does such a great job with both my hair cuts and my color requests. She takes into account my hair texture and cares about the health of my hair, which was very important to me as well. She insists that she wouldn't give me a style that she wasn't proud of, and after a few sessions, I know I can trust her to do me right.
The salon itself is comfortable and clean, and whatever kind of tea they serve is wonderful. The rest of the staff is very friendly and popular in their own right. While my color is processing I see them take care of other clients professionally and quickly, even including some walk-ins.
Happy this place is so close and always able to find an appointment reasonably soon.

text.text:

originalText.text:
I got a really bad bleach done at a salon down at 5th avenue and was desperately trying to fix it. At this point my hair was extremely damaged (hair melting, frizzy ends, etc) and I was completely hopeless. I visited this salon with barely any expectations and asked for a rich dark brown color. He was extremely meticulous and professional with great service. My hair went from a horrible, green color to a rich brown color.
If you’re looking for a salon with a skilled and kind stylist, 100% I’d recommend Salon 601.
Great price and excellent service.

originalText.text:
This review is really one star but I’m giving two stars because of how kind, attentive and professional the Asian front desk woman was towards me night of my *last ever* appointment at this salon. I’d give this place five stars if she ran the place, shout out to women of color who can survive employment by white men.

My real 1 star review is for 2 reasons. First, as a native and local, I try very much to support local businesses, unfortunately not only was I robbed at Salon 601, I was also given a hair treatment I did not consent to- an opalex mask? My hair has not been the same since and for further context this brand “Opalex” is under doing a class action lawsuit since Feb 2023…. Why is this salon even carrying these products still? I digress. I came in for a simple wash and trim… how much? $150 note including the cash tips.

You might think $150, Manhattan? Standard. Wrong. A three centimeter straight trim? Standard straight blow, no tools after. Robbery. Moving forward, I’ll take my chances across the street at the Universal Barber shop.
